main_definition: Wishing or wanting something to happen, achieve, or possess.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adjective - Wished for or wanted by someone.
meanings_and_examples.example: She has a desired job position in the company.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Noun - Something that is wanted, sought after, or coveted.
meanings_and_examples.example: The diamond ring was her most prized possession and highly desired item.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Verb (past tense: desired) - To have a strong wish for something to happen or be obtained.
meanings_and_examples.example: After years of saving, he finally had the desire to purchase his dream car.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adverb - With a strong inclination or preference towards doing or achieving something.
meanings_and_examples.example: He worked diligently on this project because it was desired by him and his family.
